channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Maintenance Mode & Coming Soon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Maintenance Mode & Coming Soon

item.title: CVE-2022-1576|2024-08-03T00:10:03.924Z -- unknown -- wp%20maintenance%20mode%20%26%20coming%20soon
item.description: The WP Maintenance Mode & Coming Soon WordPress plugin before 2.4.5 is lacking CSRF when emptying the subscribed users list, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin perform such action via a CSRF attack
